feed.title: Auramance

entry.title: Status Update
entry.content:
Hey! I am still working on this project. Donâ€™t worry. I just had to slow down because schoolwork started to pile up on me. Thereâ€™s a lot of stuff that still needs to be done before alpha testing, and itâ€™s not just new stuff that needs to be added. I often go back over old documents only to realise that I never updated them. So, a large portion of work goes into the maintenance of this wiki. But thatâ€™s okay: The wiki is the product. Without the wiki, I canâ€™t dispense the game in a nice way.

In case you are wondering, I currently have a list of things that need to be done for alpha testing to start. Below is that list, but please remember that it isnâ€™t comprehensive. I get distracted with new mechanics a lotâ€¦

  • All skills need to be done
  • Spells need to be done
  • Items
  • Mechanics need to be finalized
  • Small campaign, with enemies and locations

P.S. Happy Halloween!ðŸ‘»

entry.title: Welcome to the New Wiki
entry.content: Welcome to the brand new wiki for Auramance! Iâ€™ll be slowly migrating pages here and cleaning up each pageâ€™s style. For now, links that I think may be most useful to new users will be in the navbar.
